NYS Digital First Standards Report Cards

    • OGS.ny.gov

Automated Performance Accessibility Reports

for OGS.ny.gov

Automated Performance Reports

These reports represent a point-in-time analysis of several contributing factors to overall website performance. These tests were run using Google Lighthouse against both the desktop and mobile views of the 5 pages that were sampled. Devices were throttled to simulate a 4G loading experience. A continuous reporting environment is in progress to track performance over time.

Design Construction

Lighthouse Performance Reports

for https://ogs.ny.gov/design-construction

  • Mobile Report for
  • Desktop Report for Design Construction

Mobile Score 60 / 100

Desktop Score 55 / 100

Mobile Metrics

Click on a metric button for additional details.

Time until the first piece of content is rendered on screen.
How long it takes for the largest visible element to load.
How long it takes for the largest visible element to load.
How much the page layout shifts during loading.
How quickly the contents of a page are visibly populated.

Desktop Metrics

Click on a metric for additional details.

Time until the first piece of content is rendered on screen.
How long it takes for the largest visible element to load.
How long it takes for the largest visible element to load.
How much the page layout shifts during loading.
How quickly the contents of a page are visibly populated.
